title: Sir Walter Raleighs instructions to his sonne and to posterity
author: Raleigh, Walter, Sir, 1552?-1618.
publisher: Printed for Beniamin Fisher, dwelling in Aldersgate-street at the Talbot,
notes: Pages 52 and 61 misnumbered as 34 and 47 respectively.
Contains frontispiece with portrait of Sir Walter Raleigh.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
